snippet: Thom Tillis’s victory in a North Carolina primary was expected, but Republicans have had positive polling results in Colorado and Alaska. The overall race, though, hasn’t changed much.

byline.original: By JOSH KATZ and AMANDA COX

lead_paragraph: Thom Tillis’s victory in a North Carolina primary was expected, but Republicans have had positive polling results in Colorado and Alaska. The overall race, though, hasn’t changed much.

headline.main: Why Republicans Have a 55 Percent Chance of Retaking the Senate
